overview: Kang Hyeon-joong, a former National Intelligence Service agent, is currently running a private investigator office after he quit. Ha Mi-so is his secretary helping him with his daily tasks in the office. One day, a woman whose name is Yoo-ra visits the office and requests him to investigate about a man named Min-ho, whom she loves. She wanted to know what Min-ho really thinks about her.
title: Detecive Agency 2
